title: Huawei's Kirin 9000 chip is multiple times performance of nearest rival, Huawei Mate 40 3rd generation 5G smartphone is multiple times rival performance, Is US suppression of Huawei a disservice to global smartphone lovers & tech enthusiasts? - Quora

response.answer_text: Even if the first statement is a bit generous, denying the world Huawei's excellent handsets simply because they're better at 5G infrastructure than US companies is shortsighted and an immense disservice to the industry as a whole. The US have set us all back years with their ridiculous protectionist policies.
